SEARCH
Package hms.account

Class Doctor

java.lang.Object
hms.account.User
hms.account.Doctor
public class Doctor extends User
Represents a medical doctor with capabilities to manage patients and appointments. This class extends the User class, adding specific attributes and methods suitable for medical operations.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Doctor.PatientCount
    Keeps track of the number of appointments associated with each patient under the care of a doctor.

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(String staffID, String name, String gender, int age)
      Constructor initializes a Doctor with identification and demographic details, loading or initializing a timetable as needed.
      Parameters:
      staffID - Unique identifier for the doctor.
      name - Doctor's name.
      gender - Doctor's gender.
      age - Doctor's age.

  • Method Details

    • toCSV

      public String toCSV()
      Serializes doctor's information into a CSV format string.
      Overrides:
      toCSV in class User
      Returns:
      CSV string of doctor's data.

    • fromCSV

      public static Doctor fromCSV(String data)
      Deserializes a string in CSV format to create a Doctor object.
      Parameters:
      data - CSV formatted string.
      Returns:
      Doctor object instantiated from the CSV data.

    • updateDoctors

      public static List<Doctor> updateDoctors()
      Updates or reloads the list of doctors from the CSV file.
      Returns:
      A list of updated doctor objects.

    • getDoctors

      public static List<Doctor> getDoctors()
      Retrieves a list of all doctors from the system. If the list of doctors is empty, it fetches the list from the CSV file to ensure it is up-to-date.
      Returns:
      A list of all doctors currently registered in the system.

    • getTimeTable

      public List<Appointment> getTimeTable()
      Retrieves the doctor's appointment timetable, loading it from storage if not already loaded.
      Returns:
      A list of the doctor's appointments.

    • initializeTimeTable

      public void initializeTimeTable()
      Initializes a new timetable for the doctor with appointments for the next three days.

    • getPatientCounts

      public List<Doctor.PatientCount> getPatientCounts()
      Retrieves or calculates the patient counts from the timetable if not already done.
      Returns:
      A list of patient counts.

    • getPatients

      public List<Patient> getPatients()
      Retrieves a list of patients who have appointments with this doctor. This method compiles a list of patients based on the current count of appointments per patient that are either closed, confirmed, or pending.
      Returns:
      A list of patients who have been seen or are scheduled to be seen by this doctor.

    • addPatient

      public void addPatient(Patient patient)
      Adds a patient to the doctor's list, updating the number of appointments if the patient already exists.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient to add.

    • removePatient

      public void removePatient(Patient patient)
      Removes a patient from the doctor's list, decrementing the count of appointments or removing entirely if no appointments remain.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient to remove.

    • getDoctor

      public static Doctor getDoctor()
      Utility method to select and return a doctor from a list by allowing user interaction.
      Returns:
      Selected doctor or null if none selected.

    • getByID

      public static Doctor getByID(String doctorID)
      Retrieves a doctor by their unique ID from a list.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID to search for.
      Returns:
      Doctor object if found, otherwise null.
